/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG  -shared -Wl,-soname,libargon2-opencl.so -o libargon2-opencl.so CMakeFiles/argon2-opencl.dir/gpuMiner/lib/argon2-opencl/device.cpp.o CMakeFiles/argon2-opencl.dir/gpuMiner/lib/argon2-opencl/globalcontext.cpp.o CMakeFiles/argon2-opencl.dir/gpuMiner/lib/argon2-opencl/kernelloader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/argon2-opencl.dir/gpuMiner/lib/argon2-opencl/programcontext.cpp.o CMakeFiles/argon2-opencl.dir/gpuMiner/lib/argon2-opencl/processingunit.cpp.o CMakeFiles/argon2-opencl.dir/gpuMiner/lib/argon2-opencl/kernelrunner.cpp.o  -Wl,-rpath,/root/project/XENGPUMiner/build: libargon2-gpu-common.so -lOpenCL
